name: Pop and Chicks
description:
A minimalistic puzzle where you have to think before you act, one wrong move and 'Pop' chicken could get lost! She knows that there are no dangers on the farm, but things always change places, leaving her confused.



Your objective is to save your lost chicks, bringing them to the comfort of the barn, where there is a cozy chicken coop for everyone and abundant affection from a caring mother.



Features:
  • 40 handcrafted levels.
  • Simple and intuitive gameplay.

  • Tips, showing where the barrel will fall and where its offspring are.

  • Redo function. In case Pop gets lost.

  • Immersive and cozy soundtrack.
  • Control a cute chicken. 🐔🐤
